# setValue(_:forKey:)

**Instance Method**

Invokes [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray/setValue(_:forKey:)] on each of the array’s items using the specified `value` and `key`.

## Declaration

```swift
func setValue(_ value: Any?, forKey key: String)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The object value.
- **key**: The key to store the value.

## Key-Value Coding

- **value(forKey:)**: Returns an array containing the results of invoking [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray/value(forKey:)] using `key` on each of the array’s objects.

items.description: Returns an array containing the results of invoking [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray/value(forKey:)] using `key` on each of the array’s objects.
